meaningMnemonic:
The <radical>blue</radical> radical and the <kanji>blue</kanji> kanji are exactly the same.

Additionally, this can also mean <kanji>young</kanji>. You can remember this because young people have potential as limitless as the blue sky!
readingMnemonic: You've been feeling really <kanji>blue</kanji>. Mostly because your skin, hair, and eyes have all turned blue. It was an out-of-the-blue transformation! But now someone places his hand on your shoulder and points at your <reading>sa</reading>ber (せい). It's blue too! You aren't alone!
